segments.text: Fred , can you tell me how I can open my QQ Zone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Click your right key of mouse and choose QQ Zone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have to provide some of my information , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep ! The nick name for your zone , address , gender and so on . Some of them are privacy , so you have the right to keep secret here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All information is filled in and now I can design my zone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can choose one type to make it as your background , and then find a music player and put your favorite songs into it , so your visitors can enjoy the music after entering into your zone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now everything is OK . I can write my blog , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( Half an hour , Janice begins shouting excitedly . ) What's the matter with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look ! David gives his following-comment on my first blog . He is my first visitor .
segments.speaker: S2
